channel.title: Where to go with server development?
channel.description:
So, we all know what's happening right about now. There's loads of 06-10 remakes coming out, along with those 700+ servers. I still like the 317 era, imo it's really easy to work with.
But where do we go with it? Do we make a custom game, like Lare(Clawz Fury) and Asshole_rule is, do we try more remakes, or do we throw a bunch of custom shit in it?
I was thinking of making a server (it'll be a bitch) with 3 worlds. 1) being a remake (around the 08 era) 2) A community based pk-server. Community-based meaning, we(assuming I get a team) will receive input from our users (Like RuneScape did with bringing the wildy back), and add content that way. 3) A unique content-based server. It wouldn't just have 1 unique idea, but many. Integrating them all together would be rather hard if not done right, but it is indeed possible.
Your opinions? [I'm willing to start a team to work on this. Message me about it, we'll be using the Project Skibblez thread, as I'm still doing my remake server either way.]

item.title: Where to go with server development?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

So, we all know what’s happening right about now. There’s loads of 06-10 remakes coming out, along with those 700+ servers. I still like the 317 era, imo it’s really easy to work with.

But where do we go with it? Do we make a custom game, like Lare(Clawz Fury) and Asshole_rule is, do we try more remakes, or do we throw a bunch of custom shit in it?

I was thinking of making a server (it’ll be a bitch) with 3 worlds.

  1. being a remake (around the 08 era)
  2. A community based pk-server. Community-based meaning, we(assuming I get a team) will receive input from our users (Like RuneScape did with bringing the wildy back), and add content that way.
  3. A unique content-based server. It wouldn’t just have 1 unique idea, but many. Integrating them all together would be rather hard if not done right, but it is indeed possible.

Your opinions?
[I’m willing to start a team to work on this. Message me about it, we’ll be using the Project Skibblez thread, as I’m still doing my remake server either way.]
